column1: Teachers are the backbone of our public education system. It's time we pay our teachers more let them unionize and provide them the resources they need to support our students. @JulianCastro's #PeopleFirstEd plan does just that.

As mayor of San Antonio @JulianCastro launched pre-K for SA to give all 3 and 4 year olds access to pre-kindergarten education. With his Pre-K for USA program that commitment would be nationwide. #PeopleFirstEd
Sec. @JulianCastro's #PeopleFirstEducation plan represents a bold commitment to our nation's students teachers and classrooms—from pre-K to college and beyond. Read more here: https://t.co/Ga4xlBQoUj
